messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] OT- Presidential Candidates' Views on Homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: It doesn t matter what the president things about homeschooling, honestly. I get so tired of the conservative Christian-Homeschoolers playing that same boring
messages.messageBody:
It doesn't matter what the president things about homeschooling, honestly.
I get so tired of the conservative Christian-Homeschoolers playing that same
boring card to manipulate homeschooelers to vote for conservatives so they can
further their primary goal, which is political conservative theocracy.

Sandra

messages.subject: OT- Presidential Candidates' Views on Homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: I apologize if this is inappropriate for this list, and perhaps it will be returned, but I could really use some help finding quotes from the presidential
messages.messageBody:
I apologize if this is inappropriate for this list, and perhaps it
will be returned, but I could really use some help finding quotes
from the presidential candidates regarding their view of
homeschooling.

Although I already know who I am voting for, and even though their
stand on homeschooling wouldn't be a deciding factor for me, I am
curious, does anyone know, especially does anyone have a quote from
John Kerry regarding his stance on homeschooling?

This topic came up on a local homeschool list, and although I
searched until my eyes felt like they were going to pop out, I could
not find any reliable info on Kerry's view of homeschooling.

Thanks, Jennefer
